trajectory.actor_reasoning:
The 2016 Uganda paper reports ELISA as the virus testing method; the two most commonly used enzymes in ELISA are alkaline phosphatase and horseradish peroxidase, with EC numbers 3.1.3.1 and 1.11.1.7 respectively.

FINAL ANSWER: 3.1.3.1;1.11.1.7

messages.name: enhanced_search

messages.content:
The 2016 Uganda paper reports ELISA as the virus testing method; the two most commonly used enzymes in ELISA are alkaline phosphatase and horseradish peroxidase, with EC numbers 3.1.3.1 and 1.11.1.7 respectively.

FINAL ANSWER: 3.1.3.1;1.11.1.7
